entities.name: st mungo's hospital for magical maladies and injuries
entities.description: The text introduces St. Mungo's Hospital as a place where magical creatures can receive treatment for their ailments.

entities.name: gargoyle
entities.description: A gargoyle is mentioned as coming to life and revealing a stone staircase.

entities.name: stone staircase
entities.description: The text describes the stone staircase as moving continuously upward like a spiral escalator.

entities.name: oak door
entities.description: The oak door is described as having a brass knocker shaped like a griffin.

entities.name: griffin
entities.description: A griffin is mentioned as the shape of the brass knocker on the oak door.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as entertaining a group of people in the room.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is mentioned as rapping on the door with the griffin knocker and leading Harry and Ron inside.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as being led into the room by Professor McGonagall.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as being led into the room by Professor McGonagall.

relationships.description: The gargoyle leads to the stone staircase, which is revealed when it comes to life.
Professor McGonagall opens the oak door with the griffin knocker.
Dumbledore is entertaining a group of people in the room.
Professor McGonagall leads Harry and Ron into the room.
